attributes.review: i downloaded this app but it does not work when i try to press any of the buttons and in the description it says it tracks your location even when you are not using the app, sketchy. also, he should be impeached because i hate him so much.
attributes.title: Doesnt work

attributes.review: Great app with a lot of great information! I would suggest it to anyone!
attributes.title: Informative & User Friendly

attributes.review: I downloaded the app and it made me put my mobile number and it gave my phone an undetectable iCloud virus and I have to buy a new phone. I’m disappointed in the outcome the tech support said that many people are having this issue I would not recommend downloading this app.
attributes.title: Virus

attributes.review:
🧚🏽‍♀️✨I saw all the bad reviews but got it ✨anyways the app made me put my phone number in and then it spammed ✨my phone number I then answered the call and then I said hello the person or bot hanged up 2 days later my black✨ card was getting spent in the trump tower trump is a ✨scammer🧚🏽‍♀️✨

All y’all boomers that supporting trump🤢

Gen z for the win✨🧚🏽‍♀️
attributes.title: Scammm😩

attributes.review: I downloaded hoping to learn more about his campaign strategy and support him, but this app is so awful. I think it gave my phone a virus and it glitched the entire time. Not to mention the app kept asking me to put in personal information, and completely froze my phone. DO NOT INSTALL THIS. This is not a joke.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: I’m a huge Trump fan. MAGA FOR LIFE‼️ but as soon as I opened the app my whole phone started to glitch. It was so bad and I expect more quality from the president. It also really hard to navigate through the app to find what you need. Hard to support someone with a horrible app. Will be deleting.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: When I was going on this app the first thing I see is that orange crusty Cheeto puff looking man 😔 and it really just ruined my eyesight 🥺 I CANNOT believe they disrespect what type of person who let a orange rat on the cover page of a app 🤢 I just couldn’t do it... I’m sorry he’s just something about that ugly tan 🤧 someone please help my eyesight

I really just wanted to support my beloved president but as soon as it downloaded my phone was spammed, and I was harassed by messages and calls!! Not only that, but the app heavily glitches my phone and it’s the only app to do that! I can’t believe Mr. Donald Jenius Trump WOULD EVER put out such a horrendous app, and honestly you’ve lost my humble vote for this...🧚🏻✨
attributes.title: Don’t INSTALL!!

attributes.review: this app is so bad 🤬 it doesn’t even deserve one star 😠 it has so much bugs and completely shut down my phone 😖 it shut down my phone so bad I had to buy a new one😔 I’m an avid trump supporter 🇺🇸💪🏻 but this app is so unacceptable that I no longer support him 🤮 anyway Obama 2020 🥰✨🧚‍♀️
attributes.title: horrible app don’t use it 🤢😡

attributes.review: I had came home from a long day ( a beautiful one btw) and I decided to make this day better I will go on the trump app. Everything was perfectly fine until I opened it, I was opened with a horrible smell it smaelled like a rotten carrot orange rock, I had to go to the hospital after that later on I might sue.
attributes.title: The app stinks
